hero.subtitle: Premium wooden doors crafted with Chinese precision and Saudi heritage. Engineered for the Gulf climate, built for global standards.

standards.sectionSubtitle: Combining local expertise with global manufacturing power

saudi.title: Saudi Identity
saudi.desc: Designs deeply rooted in the rich architectural traditions of Saudi culture, ensuring project relevance.

global.title: Global Scale
global.desc: High-volume manufacturing capability via state-of-the-art Chinese facilities to meet mega project demands.

certified.title: Certified Quality
certified.desc: Rigorous international testing (ISO 9001) and domestic fire rating quality standards (SASO Approved).

projects.sectionSubtitle: From 5-star hotels to royal palaces in Saudi Arabia, our doors define premium spaces.

cta.title: Ready to bring your vision to life?
cta.subtitle: Partner with us for unmatched quality and manufacturing capability. Request a quote for your next project today.

about.heroSubtitle: A pioneering joint venture, bridging the architectural heritage of Saudi Arabia with the industrial prowess of China, crafting extraordinary doors.
about.heritageDesc: Founded as a strategic partnership, our factory represents the perfect synthesis of Saudi Arabia's architectural excellence and China's manufacturing prowess. We don't just manufacture doors — we create experiences that transform ordinary spaces into extraordinary rooms.
about.heritageDesc2: Located in the industrial heart of Riyadh with a sister facility in Guangzhou, China, our dual-location manufacturing model allows us to blend traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge automation — something only a handful of door manufacturers worldwide can claim.
about.saudiDesignDesc: Concept, design, and prototyping happens here — in our Riyadh studio.
about.chineseEngDesc: Precision CNC manufacturing in our Guangzhou factory.
about.visionDesc: To become the most trusted name in the Middle East for high-end interior and exterior doors, setting new benchmarks for sustainable production, innovative design, and uncompromising quality.
about.missionDesc: To deliver world-class wooden door solutions that seamlessly merge Saudi architectural heritage with cutting-edge manufacturing processes — ensuring every project, regardless of scale, receives the highest standard of craftsmanship.
about.timelineSubtitle: From a small workshop to a dual-continent manufacturing powerhouse
about.facilitiesDesc: State-of-the-art CNC machinery, hand-crafted detailing, and modern quality controls.
about.ctaSubtitle: Partner with the region's leading door manufacturer for your next residential or commercial project.
